summary: Completed testing of Mono Bank Integration foundation and Subscription Pricing updates. Backend: 20/20 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All Bank Accounts UI components and navigation working correctly.

GET /api/bank/status requires auth (401): PASS

test_credentials.note: Test user created and cleaned up after testing

seed_data_creation: Created test user (test_bank_user_*) for authenticated endpoint testing. Cleaned up after tests.

mocked_apis.Mono Bank Integration: MONO_SECRET_KEY, MONO_PUBLIC_KEY, MONO_WEBHOOK_SECRET are empty - bank linking will return 503 until keys are provided by user

context_for_next_testing_agent: Bank Integration foundation fully tested and working. Backend endpoints: /api/bank/supported-institutions (public), /api/bank/status (auth), /api/bank/accounts (auth), /api/bank/link/initiate (auth, returns 503 when Mono not configured), /api/bank/webhook (public). Subscription prices updated: Free=₦0, Starter=₦3,000, Business=₦7,000, Enterprise=₦10,000. Bank account limits per tier: Free=1, Starter=3, Business=5, Enterprise=Unlimited. Frontend /bank route working with BankAccounts component showing status cards, supported banks list, and 'Coming Soon' warning.

bank_endpoints./api/bank/supported-institutions: GET - Returns list of 20 Nigerian banks (public)
bank_endpoints./api/bank/status: GET - Returns bank integration status and tier limits (auth required)
bank_endpoints./api/bank/accounts: GET - Returns user's linked bank accounts (auth required)
bank_endpoints./api/bank/link/initiate: POST - Initiates bank linking session (auth required, returns 503 if Mono not configured)
